allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Chrome DevTools extension for SignalR monitoring

Implements a Chrome extension that intercepts SignalR communication
at the WebSocket protocol level. Uses Manifest V3 MAIN world injection
to hook WebSocket before any page scripts run, eliminating timing issues.
Automatically detects SignalR connections via handshake signature.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
